name: U2 Dark Flat
description:
A customized dark theme for Flat themed CSS from the Website
Theme are based on NexusPHP Dark Passion CSS
additional_info:
Release notes:
- This styles are based on Dark Passion Stylesheet from NexusPHP
- Customized some color to make it not very contrast

Instructions for the best result:
1. Go to User CP
2. Go to Tracker Settings
3. Change Stylesheet to one of this
- Blue Gene Flat
- Dark Passion
- Gray Gene

Credits:
- Zantetsu (For the original Dark Passion)
- N4O (me)
